jquerypp/dom/dimensions/dimensions.name: jQuery.dimensions
jquerypp/dom/dimensions/dimensions.description: Set and animate innerWidth and outerWidth

jquerypp/dom/form_params/form_params.name: jQuery.formParams
jquerypp/dom/form_params/form_params.description: Serializes a form into an object

jquerypp/dom/selection/selection.name: jQuery.selection
jquerypp/dom/selection/selection.description: Get and set the current text selection

jquerypp/dom/within/within.name: jQuery.within
jquerypp/dom/within/within.description: Get elements within an area or at a point

jquerypp/event/destroyed/destroyed.name: jQuery.event.destroyed
jquerypp/event/destroyed/destroyed.description: An element is removed from the DOM

jquerypp/event/key/key.name: jQuery.event.key
jquerypp/event/key/key.description: Returns a string representation of the key pressed

jquerypp/event/resize/resize.name: jQuery.event.resize
jquerypp/event/resize/resize.description: Listen to a resize event on every object
